name: Fadenkreuz
overview: Crosshairs in English, this game is similar to Mastermind. Contrary to the Crosshairs name, this is a peaceful game of the mind that you can either play against a friend or play against the computer. Try to make the opponent give up. But beware! This does not necessarily mean the profit, because the score is based on points, so that even the apparent loser can still end up the winner. Game released in Game On 1989/10 and as part of the "Big Ten C-64" compilation.
